paragraphs.text: Fair warning! This is a very long post.

a6d8ed57c31a.title: I was at the end of my day at “my wi-fi CAFE”, where I work out off…

paragraphs.text: I was at the end of my day at “my wi-fi CAFE”, where I work out off…
So this morning I put in the screen shots. They don’t mind me being there for hours, but I am too broke in this foreign country to eat here all the time so, I go home to eat.

72de30386cf2.title: I write a lot on Quora.

paragraphs.text: I write a lot on Quora.
paragraphs.name: 3c68

paragraphs.text: The questions can be repetitive. I know I’ve answered ones that ask how to recover from a bad breakup a hundred times or more, yet I’ll answer the next one and the one after that. There is an actual process that will help you through.
paragraphs.name: 7ac3

paragraphs.text: Yes! I love this part:
paragraphs.name: bacd

paragraphs.text: I average out around 30k views a month and it’s satisfying that people read my stuff, but it’s also satisfying to help those who need it when they need it.

virtuals.subtitle: I average out around 30k views a month and it’s satisfying that people read my stuff, but it’s also satisfying to help those who need it…

content.subtitle: I average out around 30k views a month and it’s satisfying that people read my stuff, but it’s also satisfying to help those who need it…

paragraphs.text: It sure does. I fall for it all the time. Sometimes it’s a good fall, other times it’s a nasty, scraped knees, bloody nose, split lip, concussion kind of fall. :) Are you still writing everyday, as in continuing the experiment? I know writing is your full-time, but is this part of that? If not, how much of a time commitment away from your regular biz…
paragraphs.name: 8b44

5aefd1de64c8.title: I thought this was a really interesting experiment.

paragraphs.text: I thought this was a really interesting experiment. Did you actually write every day, or just publish every day? Did you write some posts in advance and release later, or did you literally write a new post every day?
paragraphs.name: 98c5

6778406776f5.title: well, I blog every day for the past year and several months with a blog now 5 years old.

paragraphs.text: Inspired by this very post I accepted a challenge from my dear mum suggesting I answer an FB post looking for bloggers — it turns out the blog owner really liked my writing (based on Quora subject A2As) and I am now negotiating fees for word count and pitching potential stories. This (writing) is so completely out of my comfort zone…
